column2: CI jobs automatically update pin and test runtime dependencies of applications
column3: Applications are deployed without manual intervention
column4: Application deployment automation performs parallel rolling and/or canary deployments
column5: Deployments are run during the business day without causing negative user experiences
column6: The entire application is test provisioned and deployed in an alternate datacenter
column7: Security validation is performed by code
column8: Application deployment automation manages the sequence of deployments (e.g.: Database schema first then app servers)
column10: Performance validation is performed by code
column11: Storage resources are provisioned by code
column12: Networking resources are provisioned by code
column13: Identity services are managed by code
column14: Messaging queues are provisioned by code
column15: CI jobs assign a set of  versions to a  environment
column16: updates are only uploaded via CI
column17: CI jobs upload s to a  server
column18: deployment automation manages the sequence of deployments
column19: All non-  policy (environments roles data bags etc.) is only uploaded via CI
column20: CI jobs pin dependencies so that they cannot be modified in later deployments
